"Destroy the Darchyme": "Destroy the Darchyme!"
"Destroy all Darchyme!"
"ダーカイムを破壊せよ！"
"ダーカイムを破壊せよ！"
"ダーカイムをすべて破壊せよ！"

"Attention all operatives. D-arker contamination
mechanisms called Darchyme have appeared. They
will activate soon, so destroy them all quickly!"

"Good. No more Darchyme detected. That should
protect the surrounding environment from
contamination. Thank you all for your efforts."

"/face6 The Darchyme have activated. This will
cause massive environmental damage. Too bad
we couldn't take care of them all."
"Only one more Rhugray reading left."

"More Darchyme have appeared.
They're spread out, so you'll have to deal with them quickly."

"The Darchyme are almost ready to activate.
There's not much time left, so hurry!"

"Rhugray kill confirmed.
Don't let your guard down until they're all gone!"

"Sensors detect readings at point $(0).
Destroy the Darchyme as soon as possible!"

"各員へ告ぐ。ダーカイムと呼称される
ダーカーの環境汚染機構が出現した。
起動まで時間がない、すべて破壊しろ。"

"よし、すべてのダーカイムの反応消失。
周囲環境への汚染も防げたようだな。
各員の奮闘に感謝する。"

"/face6 ダーカイムが起動したか……
周囲環境に深刻な影響が出るが
止められなかったものは仕方がない。"
"よし、ダーカイムの反応はあと１つだ。"

"新たなダーカイムの出現を確認。
範囲が広い、迅速に処理しろ。"

"ダーカイムの起動まで
もう時間がないぞ。急げ。"

"ダーカイムの破壊を確認。
最後まで気を抜くな！"

"ポイント$(0)に反応。
急行し、ダーカイムを破壊せよ。"
